column4: Please help!!! it's just taken me ages to get a login screen, and now I have, I've logged in.... but I can't move my mouse because if I do, I'll be turfed back to login screen. I want to fix this while I have a GUI, but I'm limited to keyboard only
or if you guys can't, please direct me somewhere I can likely get good help
